Connect with Kate Email: K.Farrahi@soton.ac.uk Tel: +44 23 8059 2722 ORCID On this page Research Publications Biography Research Publications Biography Research Research groups Member of: Vision, Learning and Control Institute for Life Sciences Centre for Health Technologies Centre for Machine Intelligence Research interests the intersection of machine learning and digital health developing machine learning methods for human sensing using vision- and wearable-based technologies Publications Multimodal large language models in human-centered health: practical insights Ting Dang, Hong Jia, Katayoun Farrahi & Gabriela Marcu, 2025, IEEE Pervasive Computing, 23(4), 87-93 DOI: 10.1109/MPRV.2024.3499513 Type: article Machine learning to predict prostate artery embolization outcomes G. Vigneswaran, N. Doshi, D. Maclean, T. Bryant, M. Harris, N. Hacking, K. Farrahi, M. Niranjan & S. Modi, 2024, Cardiovascular and Interventional Radiology, 47(9), 1248-1254 DOI: 10.1007/s00270-024-03776-z Type: article DrugPose: benchmarking 3D generative methods for early stage drug discovery Zygimantas Jocys, Joanna Grundy & Katayoun Farrahi, 2024, Digital Discovery, 3(7), 1308-1318 DOI: 10.1039/d4dd00076e Type: article EpiCURB: learning to derive epidemic control policies Andrei C. Rusu, Katayoun Farrahi & Mahesan Niranjan, 2024, IEEE Pervasive Computing, 3(1), 57-62 DOI: 10.1109/MPRV.2023.3329546 Type: journalSpecialIssue OptiBreathe: an earable-based PPG system for continuous respiration rate, breathing phase, and tidal volume monitoring Julia Romero, Andrea Ferlini, Dimitris Spathis, Ting Dang, Katayoun Farrahi, Fahim Kawsar & Alessandro Montanari, 2024 DOI: 10.1145/3638550.3641136 Type: bookChapter Beyond the surface of digital contact tracing: delving into the interconnected world of technology, individuals, and society Jiejun Hu-Bolz, Katayoun Farrahi & Manuel Cebrian, 2024, IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems, 54(10), 6332-6344 DOI: 10.1109/TSMC.2024.3428393 Type: article Representation transfer and data cleaning in multi-views for text simplification Wei He, Katayoun Farrahi, Bin Chen, Bohua Peng & Aline Villavicencio, 2023, Pattern Recognition Letters, 177, 40-46 DOI: 10.1016/j.patrec.2023.11.011 Type: article Author Correction Marcin Waniek, Petter Holme, Katayoun Farrahi, Rémi Emonet, Manuel Cebrian & Talal Rahwan, 2023, Scientific Reports, 13(1) DOI: 10.1038/s41598-023-28809-4 Type: letterEditorial Cascade learning localises discriminant features in visual scene classification Junwen Wang & Katayoun Farrahi, 2023 DOI: 10.48550/arXiv.2311.12704 Type: other Flattening the curve through reinforcement learning driven test and trace policies Andrei Rusu, Kate Farrahi & Mahesan Niranjan, 2023 DOI: 10.1007/978-3-031-34586-9_14 Type: conference Biography I am an assistant professor in the ECS department at the University of Southampton working in the vision, learning and control VLC Group. Prior to joining Southampton, I was a research assistant at Idiap Research Institute.  I obtained my PhD in Computer Science from Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Lausanne (EPFL).
